Class Catalog

java.lang.Object
  Catalog
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable<Product>
public class Catalog
extends Object
implements Iterable<Product>

This class models a product catalog. It contains a collection of Product objects.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
iCarnegie
See Also:
Product

getProduct

public Product getProduct(String code)
Returns the Product object with the specified code.

Parameters:
code - a product code.
Returns:
The Product object with the specified code. Returns null if there are no products in this catalog with the specified code.
